titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيُخْطِئُ وَ يُصِيبُ غَيْرَهُ
titles.en: Chapter 9 – The man shoots at the prey, so he errs and hits something else

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيُصِيبُهُ فَيَقَعُ فِي مَاءٍ أَوْ يَتَدَهْدَهُ مِنْ جَبَلٍ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The man shoots at the hunted prey, so he hits it, so it falls into the water or it tumbles down from the mountain

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيُخْطِئُ وَ يُصِيبُ غَيْرَهُ
titles.en: Chapter 9 – The man shoots at the prey, so he errs and hits something else

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (1/355)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ عَبَّادِ بْنِ صُهَيْبٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ رَجُلٍ سَمَّى وَ رَمَى صَيْداً فَأَخْطَأَهُ وَ أَصَابَ آخَرَ فَقَالَ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Mahboub, from Abbad Bin Suheyb who said,
‘I asked Abu Abdullahasws about a man who Named (Bismillah) and shot at a prey, so he erred and hit another. So heasws said: ‘He can eat from it’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from ibn Mahbub from ‘Abbad ibn Suhayb who has said the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about the case of a man who shoots a prey and mentions the name of Allah, but misses it and hits another one. He (the Imam) said, ‘He can use it for food.’”
